sentences.en: Any action on the basis of such fragmentary evidence would be foolish.
sentences.cn: 基于如此不完整的证据采取的任何行动都是愚蠢的。

sentences.en: Benjy's mind is flooded with confused and fragmentary memories.
sentences.cn: 班吉头脑里塞满了种种混乱不清,支离破碎的回忆.

sentences.en: But the more stagnant economy, more is fragmentary job.
sentences.cn: 但越是萧条的经济, 越多的是零碎的工作.

sentences.en: Data on the world production and use of pesticides is fragmentary.
sentences.cn: 世界上有关农药的生产和利用的材料是很分散的.

sentences.en: Fragmentary nature is the main character of Carlo Scarpa's architecture.
sentences.cn: 片段性是卡罗·斯卡帕个性化建筑的显著特征.

sentences.en: His knowledge of the subject is fragmentary.
sentences.cn: 有关这学科他的知识残缺不全.

sentences.en: It is just the fragmentary part that makes things perfect.
sentences.cn: 正是残缺的部分让事物能成其完美.

sentences.en: My knowledge on economics is no more than fragmentary.
sentences.cn: 关于经济学的知识,我只知道一些.

sentences.en: Only fragmentary information on pathogenesis of bovine malignant catarrhal fever is availible.
sentences.cn: 关于牛恶性卡他热的病理发生,仅能获得一些零星的资料.

sentences.en: The facts that I have now are fragmentary.
sentences.cn: 现在我所掌握的事实只是一些断简残篇.

sentences.en: There is only fragmentary evidence to support this theory.
sentences.cn: 只有零零星星的证据证实这个理论。

sentences.en: These fragmentary quotations show the impressions prevailing almost from hour to hour at the Supreme Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这类片断引语表明最高统帅部里几乎每个小时所感到的印象.

sentences.en: They sat together on the sofa, overcome by each other's presence, beyond all except fragmentary endearments.
sentences.cn: 他俩在沙发上坐在一起, 由于重逢而激动得什么话也 说 不出来, 只是时而迸出几个表示亲热的词儿.

sentences.en: Thus, with fragmentary memory and few photos, I still can recall something.
sentences.cn: 如此这般, 借着残缺的记忆,和手上仅有的照片, 我还可以多少再抓取些回忆.

sentences.en: When they met in the church tower the gaps in their fragmentary conversation were filled up.
sentences.cn: 到了教堂的钟楼,他们零碎谈话的空隙才算给填满.

words.tran_cn: 破片的，碎片的；不完全的，零碎的
碎片；片断或不完整部分
分裂（fragment的过去分词）；使成碎片
碎片的；不完全的；断断续续的

trans.tran_cn: 碎片的，片断的，不完整的，支离破碎的
trans.tran_en: consisting of many different small parts
